#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <map>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int k;
		cin>>k;
		string s,val;
		map <string,int> m;
		for(int i=0;i<k;++i){
			cin>>s>>val;
			m[s]=(val=="+")?1:-1;
		}
		map <string,int>::iterator it;
		int ans=0;
		for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();++it){
			ans+=it->second;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
